languages.text: "Слыхал{mf||а} ли ты об Аспис Чорда, пиратке, богохульнице, ксенолюбке и отъявленной грешнице? Инцендия — ее наследница и редкость среди Вольных Торговцев. Обычно под защитой святого {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g} у них первыми отмирают совесть и богобоязненность, но только не у Инцендии".

traits.locale_text: "Слыхал ли ты об Аспис Чорда, пиратке, богохульнице, ксенолюбке и отъявленной грешнице? Инцендия — ее наследница и редкость среди Вольных Торговцев. Обычно под защитой святого Патента у них первыми отмирают совесть и богобоязненность, но только не у Инцендии".

languages.text: "Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda — pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious apostate? Incendia is her heir, and a rarity among Rogue Traders. The protection of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} typically leads to the swift atrophy of conscience and pious dread, but not in Incendia's case."
languages.original_text: "Слыхал{mf||а} ли ты об Аспис Чорда, пиратке, богохульнице, ксенолюбке и отъявленной грешнице? Инцендия — ее наследница и редкость среди Вольных Торговцев. Обычно под защитой святого {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g} у них первыми отмирают совесть и богобоязненность, но только не у Инцендии".

traits.locale_text: "Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda, pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious sinner? Incendia is her heir, and a rare sight among Rogue Traders. Typically one who is protected by the holy Warrant first experiences the atrophy of conscience and fear of Him, but not Incendia."

"Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda, pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious sinner? Incendia is her heir, and a rare sight among Rogue Traders. Typically one who is protected by the holy Warrant first experiences the atrophy of conscience and fear of Him, but not Incendia."

"Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda — pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious sinner? Incendia is her heir, and a rarity among Rogue Traders. The protection of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} typically leads to the swift atrophy of conscience and Godly fear, but not in Incendia's case."

"Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda — pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious sinner? Incendia is her heir, and a rarity among Rogue Traders. The protection of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} typically leads to the swift atrophy of conscience and Godly fear, but not in Incendia's case."

"Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda — pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious apostate? Incendia is her heir, and a rarity among Rogue Traders. The protection of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} typically leads to the swift atrophy of conscience and pious dread, but not in Incendia's case."

languages.text: “你听说过阿斯拜丝·库尔达这个人吗？她是个海盗、亵渎者、异形崇拜者，也是个罪行累累的罪人。因森蒂娅是她的继承人。像因森蒂娅这样的人，在行商浪人中非常少见。在神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}的保护下，行商浪人的良心通常会迅速萎缩，信仰也会变得不再虔诚，但因森蒂娅却并非如此。”
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda — pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious apostate? Incendia is her heir, and a rarity among Rogue Traders. The protection of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} typically leads to the swift atrophy of conscience and pious dread, but not in Incendia's case."

traits.locale_text: “你听说过阿斯拜丝·库尔达这个人吗？她是个海盗、亵渎者、异形崇拜者，也是个罪行累累的罪人。因森蒂娅是她的继承人。像因森蒂娅这样的人，在行商浪人中非常少见。在神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}的保护下，行商浪人的良心通常会迅速萎缩，信仰也会变得不再虔诚，但因森蒂娅却并非如此。”

languages.text: «¿Has oído hablar de Aspyce Chorda? Es una apóstata pirata, blasfema, xenófila y atroz. Incendia es su heredera, una rareza entre los Comerciantes Independientes. La protección de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} sagrada suele llevar al deterioro de la conciencia y al temor devoto, pero no fue así el caso de Incendia».
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda — pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious apostate? Incendia is her heir, and a rarity among Rogue Traders. The protection of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} typically leads to the swift atrophy of conscience and pious dread, but not in Incendia's case."

traits.locale_text: «¿Has oído hablar de Aspyce Chorda? Es una pecadora pirata, blasfema, xenófila y atroz. Incendia es su heredera, una rareza entre los Comerciantes Independientes. La protección de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} sagrada suele llevar al deterioro de la conciencia y al temor devoto, pero no fue así el caso de Incendia».

languages.text: 「アスパイス・コーダという海賊、冒涜者、異種族愛好家、そしておぞましい背教者の名は聞いたことがありますか？インセンディアは彼女の後継者であり、自由開拓者の中では珍しい存在です。聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}による保護は、一般的に良心と敬虔な恐怖心を急速に衰えさせますが、インセンディアの場合は違います」
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda — pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious apostate? Incendia is her heir, and a rarity among Rogue Traders. The protection of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} typically leads to the swift atrophy of conscience and pious dread, but not in Incendia's case."

traits.locale_text: 「アスパイス・コーダという海賊、冒涜者、異種族愛好家、そしておぞましい背教者の名は聞いたことがありますか？インセンディアは彼女の後継者であり、自由開拓者の中では珍しい存在です。聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}による保護は、一般的に良心と敬虔な恐怖心を急速に衰えさせますが、インセンディアの場合は違います」

languages.text: "Habt Ihr schon von Aspyce Chorda gehört – dieser Piratin, Gotteslästerin und xenophilen Apostatin? Incendia ist ihre Erbin und eine Seltenheit unter Freihändlern. Der Schutz durch den heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} führt meist zu einem raschen Verkümmern des Gewissens und der Gottesfurcht, aber nicht bei Incendia."
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda — pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious apostate? Incendia is her heir, and a rarity among Rogue Traders. The protection of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} typically leads to the swift atrophy of conscience and pious dread, but not in Incendia's case."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr schon von Aspyce Chorda gehört – Piratin, Gotteslästerin, Xenophile und unerhörte Sünderin? Incendia ist ihre Erbin und eine Seltenheit unter Freihändlern. Der Schutz durch den heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g} führt meist zu einem raschen Verkümmern des Gewissens und der Gottesfurcht, aber nicht bei Incendia."

languages.text: « Le nom d'Aspyce Chorda vous est-il familier ? Pirate, blasphématrice, xénophile et apostate invétérée ? Incendia est son héritière et elle se démarque parmi les libres-marchands. La protection apportée par la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} entraîne généralement la rapide atrophie de la conscience et de la sainte terreur, mais pas chez Incendia. »
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda — pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious apostate? Incendia is her heir, and a rarity among Rogue Traders. The protection of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} typically leads to the swift atrophy of conscience and pious dread, but not in Incendia's case."

traits.locale_text: « Le nom d'Aspyce Chorda vous est-il familier ? Pirate, blasphématrice, xénophile et pécheresse invétérée ? Incendia est son héritière et elle se démarque parmi les libres-marchands. La protection apportée par la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} entraîne généralement la rapide atrophie de la conscience et de la sainte terreur, mais pas chez Incendia. »

languages.text: "Korsan, günahkâr, zeno hayranı ve döneğin önde gideni Aspyce Chorda'yı duymuş muydun? İncendia, onun vârisidir ve Hür Tacirler arasında enderdir. Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname'nin{/g} koruyuculuğunu üstlenmek, genellikle hızlı bir vicdan ve iman körelmesine yol açar. İncendia'daysa öyle olmadı."
languages.original_text: "Have you heard of Aspyce Chorda — pirate, blasphemer, xenophile, and egregious apostate? Incendia is her heir, and a rarity among Rogue Traders. The protection of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} typically leads to the swift atrophy of conscience and pious dread, but not in Incendia's case."

traits.locale_text: "Korsan, günahkâr, zeno hayranı ve korkunç dönek Aspyce Chorda'yı duymuş muydun? İncendia onun vârisi ve çok özel bir konumda bulunan bir Hür Tacir'dir. Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}'nin koruyuculuğunu üstlenmek genellikle hızlı bir şekilde vicdan körelmesine ve dinî korkuya yol açar ama İncendia'da süreç o şekilde işlemedi."
